text: please remember that all my videos here
on YouTube are organized into playlists
on my main channel page come to this top
menu and click on playlists you'll see
all the subjects choose the subject you
want to study for example English
vocabulary and you'll see the videos
listed in the order I made them another
way to find a video is to go to my
website click on this banner and you'll
come to my homepage look under my work
my online work and choose YouTube videos
here you'll see the complete list of all
the lessons I've made to date the titles
of playlists appear in blue and under
the title of a playlist you'll see the
individual lessons if you want to view a
playlist click on the title there's a
direct link so you'll be taken to that
exact playlist on YouTube then you can
choose the video you want to watch
of course I recommend that you watch the
videos in the order I've listed them but
if you've already seen the ones at the
beginning of the list
just come to the end and you'll see the
most recent one
